description: PDEX files are saved in an encrypted format that is only supported by the Orient Computer program that created the file. PDEX files may be used for various purposes depending on the program that creates it. Mail Protect creates PDEX files to protect the contents of email and Security Folder creates PDEX files to protect users' files from ransomware attacks.

common_filenames.description: [filename].[extension].pdex - The PDEX extension is appended onto a file when it is encrypted. For example, a sample.xlsx file becomes sample.xlsx.pdex .
[filename].[extension].pdex - The PDEX extension is appended onto a file when it is encrypted. For example, a sample.xlsx file becomes sample.xlsx.pdex .
